hero.title: Energy & Mining
hero.subtitle: National Revenue Systems Protection
hero.lead: HC-1 protects production continuity, secures export corridors, and strengthens national revenue through upstream systems integration and operational assurance.

overview.heading: The Challenge
overview.intro: Energy and mining operations represent critical national revenue infrastructure. Production disruptions, export corridor vulnerabilities, and operational inefficiencies directly impact GDP, investor confidence, and sovereign economic stability.

revenue.title: Revenue Criticality
points: 30-70% of national GDP in resource-dependent economies
Direct correlation between uptime and state revenue

risks.title: Operational Risks
points: Equipment downtime: $1-5M per day per facility
Supply chain disruptions: 15-45 day recovery cycles

items.label: Equipment failure cascades
items.details: Unplanned downtime: 5-15% annual production loss; Maintenance windows: 20-40% cost overrun

items.label: Logistics corridor disruption
items.details: Port congestion: 7-21 day delays; Export pipeline sabotage: 60-180 day recovery

items.label: Workforce safety incidents
items.details: Operational halts: regulatory + reputational cost; Remote site isolation

items.label: Reactive maintenance models
items.details: Failure detection after incident; Parts availability: 14-60 day lead times

items.label: Fragmented security systems
items.details: Perimeter security ≠ systems security; OT/IT convergence gaps exploited

items.label: Data sovereignty blind spots
items.details: Foreign vendor dependencies; Compliance exposure in multi-jurisdictional operations

approach.heading: HC-1 Approach: Upstream Integration
approach.intro: HC-1 does not operate as incident responders. HC-1 architects, integrates, and governs mission-critical systems at the planning stage—anticipating disruption vectors, eliminating single points of failure, and assuring continuity through sovereign, zero-trust infrastructure.

architecture.title: Architecture & Planning
architecture.description: Map production dependencies, model disruption scenarios, design redundancy architectures, establish sovereign data governance.
architecture.outcome: Risk models that quantify downtime cost and guide capital allocation.

integration.title: Systems Integration
integration.description: Integrate OT/IT with zero-trust segmentation, deploy predictive maintenance, secure logistics corridors, establish SOC/NOC.
integration.outcome: Unified command infrastructure with SLA-based assurance.

continuity.title: Continuity Assurance
continuity.description: Real-time monitoring, automated failover, incident coordination, compliance tracking.
continuity.outcome: Operational uptime targets met, revenue protected.

confidence.label: Investor Confidence
confidence.impact: Improved sovereign credit ratings, FDI attraction

offshore.title: Offshore Platform — GPS-Denied Operations
offshore.description: An offshore oil platform loses GPS connectivity due to jamming. HC-1's CORTEX-U7 autonomous navigation maintains supply vessel operations, preventing 14-day production halt. Revenue protected: $42M.

mining.title: Mining Export Corridor — Port Congestion
mining.description: A copper mine faces 21-day port congestion. HC-1's logistics corridor monitoring predicts delay, reroutes shipments via secondary port. Contract penalties avoided. Revenue protected: $18M.

pipeline.title: Pipeline Network — Cyber Intrusion Attempt
pipeline.description: SCADA system targeted by APT group. HC-1's SOC detects lateral movement, isolates affected segment, maintains pipeline flow. Downtime avoided: 60+ days. Revenue protected: $250M+.
